snippet: Ukrainian state agencies sought to detain the head of the tax and customs service on Friday over the alleged embezzlement of around $75 million - a potentially landmark case after patchy anti-graft efforts from the Western-backed authorities....

headline.main: In Atlanta, Anti-Semitism Is Viewed Through Lens of History
headline.print_headline: In Atlanta, Anti-Semitism Is Viewed Through Lens of History

lead_paragraph: Ukrainian state agencies sought to detain the head of the tax and customs service on Friday over the alleged embezzlement of around $75 million - a potentially landmark case after patchy anti-graft efforts from the Western-backed authorities.
